location: Rio Grande do Sul, RS - Brazil
tagline: Connecting creativity and technology to transform ideas into efficient and relevant digital solutions
aboutIntro: I am a student of Internet Systems Technology at IFSul - Campus Charqueadas, focusing on web development and creating modern and efficient digital solutions. Throughout my journey, I have been working with various technologies and accumulating valuable experiences in real projects.
frontendSkills: Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, Next.js, Tailwind
additionalSkills: I also have knowledge in languages and tools such as Java, C, Python and PHP, which provides me with a solid foundation to work in different contexts and technical challenges.
professionalProfile: As a professional, I am organized, communicative, and collaborative. I have intermediate English skills and am familiar with agile methodologies, information security, artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and Open Finance. Committed to delivering quality results, I am always seeking continuous improvement and constant learning.
experienceSectionDescription: My journey in the job market
exp_depsResponsibilities: Structuring and development of the platform
Working on Front-end and Back-end of applications
exp_depsDesc: I participated in the structuring of DEPS Models, an initiative that provided me with real experience with clients and real projects. I worked in all stages of development, using agile methodologies, participating in meetings with stakeholders, and contributing to both the front-end and back-end of applications.
exp_compassRole: Scholarship | Open Finance Powered by AWS
exp_compassResponsibilities: Development focused on JavaScript and Node.js
Deepening in agile methodologies and Scrum
Study of financial innovation and Open Finance
exp_compassDesc: I was selected for the Compass UOL Open Finance Scholarship, where I deepened my knowledge in development with a focus on JavaScript and Node.js. This experience has been essential for my professional growth in a dynamic environment focused on financial innovation. It was also the period where I was able to obtain my AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification.
exp_domvsResponsibilities: Acting as a Full Stack Developer, actively contributing to the development of internal applications and systems using .NET and React.
Effective participation in the initial phase of the software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis and UML modeling.
Collaboration in an agile team through the application of Scrum methodologies, participating in dailys and sprint reviews.
Optimization of code quality through Pair Programming sessions.
Immersion in knowledge tracks for technical leveling and conducting autonomous studies via platforms such as Udemy.
Use of cloud computing tools (Azure) for organizing sprints and workflows.
exp_domvsDesc: I work as a Full Stack Developer, contributing to the development of internal applications with .NET and React, participating in the entire software lifecycle, from requirements analysis to implementation. I collaborate in an agile team (Scrum) and constantly seek technical improvement.
expNowDesc: I remain open to opportunities that not only contribute to my development but also allow me to generate value with the knowledge I have been building throughout my journey.
edu2023Desc: High school integrated with Technical Course in Informatics. During the course, I developed a solid foundation in programming and participated in practical projects that consolidated my interest in technology.
